quote: Every New Year is the direct descendant, isn't it, of a long line of proven criminals?
Let the Lord judge the criminals.
The dead should be judged like criminals, impartially, but they should be allowed the benefit of the doubt.
The punishment of criminals should serve a purpose. When a man is hanged he is useless.
When a doctor does go wrong he is the first of criminals. He has nerve and he has knowledge.
Where the criminals cover their crimes by making them legal. [On Washington D. C.]
